keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Watch Luffy Save Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates watch as their captain fights to destroy Noah and save Fish-Man Island, while the citizens cheer for Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's trust in Luffy and their role in earning the gratitude of Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Captain Collapses After Saving Island
keyMoments.description: After successfully preventing Noah from destroying Fish-Man Island, Luffy faints from exhaustion and his crew awaits his recovery.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the toll of Luffy's heroic actions and sets up the crew's continued presence on Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Complete Defeat of New Fish-Man Pirates
keyMoments.description: All members of the New Fish-Man Pirates are shown lying defeated after their battles with the Straw Hat Pirates, marking the end of their threat to Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the dissolution of the crew as a threat and the end of Hody Jones' plan to take over Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Claims Fish-Man Island (Flashback)
keyMoments.description: A flashback shows Whitebeard and his crew arriving at Fish-Man Island approximately 20+ years ago, where he befriended King Neptune and declared the island under his protection.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals how the Whitebeard Pirates protected Fish-Man Island for decades, preventing attacks and discrimination, and establishes a parallel between Whitebeard and Luffy as saviors of the island.
